name: claude-lab-notebook
description: Progressive disclosure note-taking system for research and experiments. Creates organized markdown notes with templates for experiments, decisions, and troubleshooting. Optimizes context usage through hierarchical indexing.

setup-notes.description: Initialize the experiment notebook system in your project

create-note.description: Create a new experiment, decision, or troubleshooting note

update-index.description: Update INDEX.md with recent findings and consolidate notes

features: Progressive disclosure - loads only what's needed
Three note types: experiments, decisions, troubleshooting
Smart index consolidation and pattern extraction
Context-efficient: ~5K tokens vs 50K+ loading all notes

setup.postInstall: Run /setup-notes in your project directory to initialize the system
